languages.text: "{name} фон Валанциус, я безмерно благодарен, что вы сумели уделить мне время перед встречей с губернатором. Однако пока дела не захлестнули нас с головой, позвольте уточнить — где же господин ван Калокс? Я полагал, он сопровождает вас в путешествии".

traits.locale_text: "{name} фон Валанциус, я безмерно благодарен, что вы сумели уделить мне время перед встречей с губернатором. Однако пока дела не захлестнули нас с головой, позвольте уточнить — где же господин ван Калокс? Я полагал, он сопровождает вас в путешествии".

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius, I greatly appreciate that you've found the time to see me before meeting with the governor. But before we get wrapped up in important matters, allow me to enquire — where is Master van Calox? I thought he accompanied you on the journey."
languages.original_text: "{name} фон Валанциус, я безмерно благодарен, что вы сумели уделить мне время перед встречей с губернатором. Однако пока дела не захлестнули нас с головой, позвольте уточнить — где же господин ван Калокс? Я полагал, он сопровождает вас в путешествии".

"{name} von Valancius, I greatly appreciate that you've found the time to see me before meeting with the governor. But before we get wrapped up in important matters, allow me to inquire — where is Master van Calox? I thought he accompanied you on the journey."

"{name} von Valancius, I greatly appreciate that you've found the time to see me before meeting with the governor. But before we get wrapped up in important matters, allow me to enquire — where is Master van Calox? I thought he accompanied you on the journey."

"{name} von Valancius, I greatly appreciate that you've found the time to see me before meeting with the governor. But before we get wrapped up in important matters, allow me to enquire — where is Master van Calox? I thought he accompanied you on the journey."

"{name} von Valancius, I greatly appreciate that you've found the time to see me before meeting with the governor. But before we get wrapped up in important matters, allow me to enquire — where is Master van Calox? I thought he accompanied you on the journey."

languages.text: “{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，我很感激您愿意在与总督见面之前，抽出时间见我一面。不过，在我们讨论重要的事情之前，请允许我先问个问题：冯·卡洛克斯大师在哪里呢？我还以为他会和您一起来呢。”
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, I greatly appreciate that you've found the time to see me before meeting with the governor. But before we get wrapped up in important matters, allow me to enquire — where is Master van Calox? I thought he accompanied you on the journey."

traits.locale_text: “{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，我很感激您愿意在与总督见面之前，抽出时间见我一面。不过，在我们讨论重要的事情之前，请允许我先问个问题：冯·卡洛克斯大师在哪里呢？我还以为他会和您一起来呢。”

languages.text: «{name} von Valancius, agradezco mucho que haya sacado tiempo para verme antes de su reunión con el gobernador. Pero antes de tratar los asuntos importantes, permítame una pregunta. ¿Dónde está el maestro van Calox? Tenía entendido que lo acompañaba en su viaje».
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, I greatly appreciate that you've found the time to see me before meeting with the governor. But before we get wrapped up in important matters, allow me to enquire — where is Master van Calox? I thought he accompanied you on the journey."

traits.locale_text: «{name} von Valancius, agradezco mucho que haya sacado tiempo para verme antes de su reunión con el gobernador. Pero antes de tratar los asuntos importantes, permítame una pregunta. ¿Dónde está el maestro van Calox? Tenía entendido que lo acompañaba en su viaje».

languages.text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様、総督との面会前に私と会うお時間をいただき有難うございます。しかし、重要事項をまとめる前に尋ねたいことがあるのです。ヴァン・カロックス様はどちらへ？ご同行されていたのではありませんか？」
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, I greatly appreciate that you've found the time to see me before meeting with the governor. But before we get wrapped up in important matters, allow me to enquire — where is Master van Calox? I thought he accompanied you on the journey."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様、総督との面会前に私と会うお時間をいただき有難うございます。しかし、重要事項をまとめる前に尋ねたいことがあるのです。ヴァン・カロックス様はどちらへ？ご同行されていたのではありませんか？」

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius, ich weiß es sehr zu schätzen, dass Ihr Zeit für mich gefunden habt, bevor Ihr den Gouverneur trefft. Aber bevor wir uns wichtigen Angelegenheiten widmen, gestattet eine Frage – wo ist Meister van Calox? Ich dachte, er hätte Euch auf der Reise begleitet."
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, I greatly appreciate that you've found the time to see me before meeting with the governor. But before we get wrapped up in important matters, allow me to enquire — where is Master van Calox? I thought he accompanied you on the journey."

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius, ich weiß es sehr zu schätzen, dass Ihr Zeit für mich gefunden habt, bevor Ihr den Gouverneur trefft. Aber bevor wir uns wichtigen Angelegenheiten widmen, gestattet eine Frage – wo ist Meister van Calox? Ich dachte, er hätte Euch auf der Reise begleitet."

languages.text: « {name} von Valancius, je vous remercie de prendre le temps de me rencontrer avant d'aller voir le gouverneur. Mais avant d'entrer dans le vif du sujet, où se trouve Maître van Calox ? J'avais cru comprendre qu'il vous accompagnerait. »
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, I greatly appreciate that you've found the time to see me before meeting with the governor. But before we get wrapped up in important matters, allow me to enquire — where is Master van Calox? I thought he accompanied you on the journey."

traits.locale_text: « {name} von Valancius, je vous remercie de prendre le temps de me rencontrer avant d'aller voir le gouverneur. Mais avant d'entrer dans le vif du sujet, où se trouve Maître van Calox ? J'avais cru comprendre qu'il vous accompagnerait. »

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius, valiyle toplantınız öncesinde zaman ayırıp beni gördüğünüz için gerçekten müteşekkirim ancak önemli konulara geçmeden önce müsaadenizle bir sorum olacak: Üstat van Calox nerede? Yolculuğunuz sırasında size eşlik ettiğini sanıyordum."
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius, I greatly appreciate that you've found the time to see me before meeting with the governor. But before we get wrapped up in important matters, allow me to enquire — where is Master van Calox? I thought he accompanied you on the journey."

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius, valiyle toplantınız öncesinde zaman ayırıp beni gördüğünüz için gerçekten müteşekkirim ancak önemli konulara geçmeden önce müsaadenizle bir sorum olacak: Üstat van Calox nerede? Yolculuğunuz sırasında size eşlik ettiğini sanıyordum."
